name: 召喚ガキ Shoukan Gaki - Bratty Summoner Story
name_original: 召喚ガキ Shoukan Gaki - Bratty Summoner Story
description:
It's all fun and games, until...

Many "chosen ones" have tried, and just as many have failed, to put an end to the antics of a powerful sorceress who brings terror to the land from high up in her castle. Now, the next chosen one named Lorelei will take her stand against Lady Maura...

FEATURES

- Summon 4 somewhat different creatures to power up in battle and overcome your foes

- Hate wasting turns healing and buffing your party? No more! Your companions will automatically do these things so you can focus on beating the enemy to a pulp.

- A shameless appearance by AIR MAN from Rockman 2

- Cameos from at least 4 characters from Goburin no Tower

- "PURE" RPG Maker 2000; no fancy custom battle systems or menus to interfere with the timeless classic feel of the golden era of RPG Maker

- As always, crisp, legible MS Gothic font for optimal enjoyment of the text

CONTENT ADVISORY

THIS GAME CONTAINS GRAPHICS, SOUND, STORY, AND GAMEPLAY. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

IMPORTANT DISCLOSURE

Some chipsets from the VIPRPG resource pool were used in this game. VIPRPG advises that the resources hosted on their pages are "for everyone" so long as good sense is used when creating games with them.
